name: RC-Olympics
description:
Out of control! 

Humans on earth can't control themselves. They are being controlled by aliens, who use them for their own olympic games. But even aliens don't have full control. Due to the enormous distance between both planets, their remote commands have a high latency: they only see the results of their actions after the transmission is sent to earth and the results come back.

Play solo or against up to 3 players.

Can you beat a platformer without direct control?
